GSD.product_version: versions from v4.6 to before v5.4.200
GSD.description:
tty: goldfish: Fix free_irq() on remove

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.200 by commit f7183c76d500324b8b5bd0af5e663cfa57b7b836, it was introduced in version v4.6 by commit 465893e18878e119d8d0255439fad8debbd646fd. For more details please see the references link.
